title: i cant get in to PBE
body:
i want to play on the PBE client from league but when i try to sign up it says ''was ziggs here because something blew up on this page''
i cant play on the PBE client and i was wondering if i could get some help from someone

replies.body: PBE is currently down for maintenance per the [PBE status page.](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe)  Players won't be able to sign up or access the PBE page during this time.  Hang tight until things are back up!
